rules_text:
[i]Corrupt[/i] – When this creature enters, if you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, this creature gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, exile the top card of each player's library. You may play one of those cards this turn without paying its mana cost.
